version_description: Minor fixes.

√ Completely redesigned new version that helps keep an eye on a device performance & activity even easier!
√ Now every metric is available as a separate widget.
√ Other minor improvements.

If you are enjoying the new version of Usage Moni
Animations are now faster and review prompts are more friendly :)
About view got a fresh look!
Fixed how leaving review from the app works!
This version includes an update to the widget's color style - now it's dark! Enjoy!
In the previous release a new dark mode for widget was introduced, in this one - the mode is configurable with the ​support of light and dark modes. Enjoy!
A few minor design fixes and improvements.

• Added label showing Used storage space
• Split network metrics into Wi-Fi and WWAN
• Minor visual tweaks in the widget for the best use of space

• Fixed occasional incorrect Network numbers
---

• Minor fixes for the widget
√ Fixed calculation of available storage.
√ Small visual fixes.
New Dark and Light themes with iOS 13 support!

Completely remade with SwiftUI!
Extended the functionality with battery and device info. 
A more rich overview of the existing metrics. 
Widget is now configurable - choose what you want to see in it!
I hope you like the update! Chee
Fixed scrolling performance issue.

• Network speed
• Custom ordering
• Different appearance colors

• Various design improvements

version_description:
• Compare your device specifications with any other iPhone or iPad ever made!
• Extended device specifications
• Network activity graph
• Fixes for widget layout

• Fixed a few minor bugs from 3.3 release

Version 3.3 includes:
• Compare your device specifications with any other iPhone or iPad ever made!
• Extended device specifications
• Network activity graph
• Fixes for widget layout

• Indicators for charging and low power mode in the battery widget view
• Re-enabled device widget view
• Share the app to unlock the Compare feature for one day!

• Fixed sharing issue on iPads.

• Added custom Period duration setting

• Added support for iOS 14 widgets!
• Minor fixes for iOS 14 widgets!

• Added Device info widget
• Fixes and improvements for widgets.

• Added Connection widget for Today View
It is built in the old-style because new iOS 14 widgets do not support real-time updates. Please understand it as a technical limitation.
• Added small graphical widgets for Memory and Storage.

• Added Battery widget!
Please note that it is not real-time and it might be updated with a delay.
